dialogue:
If I ask him why he's destroying [color=#b38b2b]Wonderland[/color], what if the reason
is something good? I think he was my best friend.

I remember that when my house was robbed, he ran across the
hills from a whole other meadow.

I called him because he was the only person I could think of,
and [color=#b38b2b]Piper[/color] stayed all week to make sure I was safe.

He's been nothing but good to me. He just gets a bit defensive
when I hang out with other people more than him.

Especially when I talk to other people while we’re on a picnic or
having a tea party. He’d get all tense and scowly, but when I’d
ask him what’s wrong, he’d just say ‘I wanna talk with [color=#b38b2b]you[/color].’
I always reasoned that it was because he didn’t have many other friends.
